body:
i'm thankful for fruit adventure flavored tic tacs

i'm thankful for kettle cut potato chips

i'm thankful miso and i played fetch again during a break in the rain

i'm thankful for _lost children archive,_ which i started last night and is very good

i'm thankful that the new season of _the bachelor_ started and i have thus returned to my hobby of using [otter.ai](http://otter.ai) to make a transcript of the show mixed with d and i's voices talking about it

i'm thankful that blog legend edith zimmerman has a great new newsletter and in particular for the most recent issue: 

[https://drawinglinks.substack.com/p/weekend-comics](https://drawinglinks.substack.com/p/weekend-comics)

i'm thankful, though i don't get to do it tomorrow because of an early meeting, to have changed to working out first thing in the morning and feeling like i'm having much better runs 

i'm thankful that the increased dose of my antidepressant seems good

i'm thankful that next week for work i'll be in florida and it's supposed to be unseasonably warm
normalized_markdown:
i'm thankful for fruit adventure flavored tic tacs

i'm thankful for kettle cut potato chips

i'm thankful miso and i played fetch again during a break in the rain

i'm thankful for _lost children archive,_ which i started last night and is very good

i'm thankful that the new season of _the bachelor_ started and i have thus returned to my hobby of using [otter.ai](http://otter.ai) to make a transcript of the show mixed with d and i's voices talking about it

i'm thankful that blog legend edith zimmerman has a great new newsletter and in particular for the most recent issue: 

[https://drawinglinks.substack.com/p/weekend-comics](https://drawinglinks.substack.com/p/weekend-comics)

i'm thankful, though i don't get to do it tomorrow because of an early meeting, to have changed to working out first thing in the morning and feeling like i'm having much better runs 

i'm thankful that the increased dose of my antidepressant seems good

i'm thankful that next week for work i'll be in florida and it's supposed to be unseasonably warm
